creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: multi-striped fabric in green, yellow, dark blue, cream and black; embroidery across upper front and upper back; ornamental animals embroidered in same colors as in fabric as well as red, orange, bright blue, light green and white; embroidery also includes squares, diamonds, triangles as well as multicolored striped edging at collar and front opening and part way down the front seam
title: Huipil
